entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:53 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
